description: The Operating System for Modern Families. One dashboard for schedules, school updates, chores, and everything in between.

userStories.title: Family Account Setup
userStories.description: As a parent, I can create a family account and invite my partner so we can manage our family together.
acceptanceCriteria: Sign up with email + password or Google OAuth
Create a Family with a name
Partner joins same Family on signup

userStories.title: Add Children Profiles
userStories.description: As a parent, I can add my children's profiles with basic info so the system knows who we're managing.
acceptanceCriteria: Add child: name, age, school name
Avatar or emoji for each child

userStories.title: Family Dashboard
userStories.description: As a parent, I see a dashboard showing today's events for every family member at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Today view: all events for all family members

userStories.title: Shared Calendar
userStories.description: As a parent, I can add events (school, sports, playdates) to a shared family calendar visible to both parents.
acceptanceCriteria: Add event: title, date/time, child, category
Categories: school, sports, medical, social, other
Both parents see all events in real-time

userStories.title: Chore Assignment
userStories.description: As a parent, I can create and assign chores to family members with a rotation system.

userStories.title: Smart Reminders
userStories.description: As a parent, I get timely reminders for upcoming events, deadlines, and chores.
acceptanceCriteria: Push notification for events (configurable lead time)
